subject: Basketball
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: By the time the United States women’s basketball squad reaches London on July 25, it will have flown about 6,750 miles, hitting three countries in just 10 days.
snippet: By the time the United States women’s basketball squad reaches London on July 25, it will have flown about 6,750 miles, hitting three countries in just 10 days.
